subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jared Jeffries, one of the Knicks' best defenders, will be available again Wednesday night and is expected to cover Detroit's Tayshaun Prince, who exploited the Knicks' defensive shortcomings earlier this month.
snippet: Jared Jeffries, one of the Knicks' best defenders, will be available again Wednesday night and is expected to cover Detroit's Tayshaun Prince, who exploited the Knicks' defensive shortcomings earlier this month.
